name: Misdirection and Counter-Deception
description: Using advanced deception techniques to neutralize PSN control structures.

cards.title: The Red Herring Gambit
cards.description: Leading a manipulator to focus on false leads while you dismantle their control elsewhere.
bulletpoints: Introducing an irrelevant yet seemingly important topic diverts their focus.
Exaggerating minor details shifts their attention away from their main objective.
Using ambiguity prevents them from forming clear strategies against you.
cards.summaryText: Throw out a fake important topic to pull their focus away, blow up minor details to shift their attention from the real target, and keep things vague so they can't build a solid strategy against you.

cards.title: Weaponized Overconfidence
cards.description: Encouraging overestimation of their own control to make them vulnerable to exposure.
bulletpoints: Subtly reinforcing their belief in their invulnerability leads to reckless actions.
Allowing them to believe they have 'won' sets them up for greater failures.
Exploiting their arrogance by feeding them misleading cues forces them into predictable behaviors.
cards.summaryText: Gently pump up their belief that they're untouchable so they get sloppy, let them think they won to set up a bigger fall later, and exploit their arrogance by feeding false signals that lock them into predictable moves.

cards.title: The Controlled Meltdown
cards.description: Applying carefully placed psychological pressure to force PSNs into public self-destruction.
bulletpoints: Presenting subtle yet undeniable contradictions in their statements triggers cognitive stress.
Strategic silence and long pauses force them to overcompensate, revealing their weaknesses.
Encouraging emotional outbursts in controlled environments causes them to self-sabotage.
cards.summaryText: Point out subtle contradictions in what they say to trigger mental stress, use strategic silence and pauses to make them overreact and show weakness, and push them toward emotional outbursts in controlled settings so they self-destruct.
